channel.title: Hearts of Wulin vs the World II
channel.description:
*Hello again, friend of a friend, I knew you when* *Our common goal was waiting for the world to end...* *Now that the truth is just a rule that you can bend* *You crack the whip, shape-shift and trick the past again*
*Hearts of Wulin vs the World* adapts our favorite RPG of romantic Wuxia to play out modern romantic adventures of magical-realism video game-inflected martial arts rock and roll. Think *Scott Pilgrim vs the World* , the *Persona* games, maybe *Glee* or *Josie and the Pussycats* with more kung fu, add elements of Bollywood, K-Pop, and the Wu-Tang Clan, blend thoroughly, and serve.
We'll create a group of characters, including their musical talents, and throw them together into a musical romantic wuxia fantasia. Come prepared to describe the soundtrack over your fights, your amazing outfits, and your feelings that can only be properly expressed via music.
We'll use Safety Tools including Lines & Veils, the X-Card, and Open Door to make sure everyone has maximum fun. This event adheres to [The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) in all other aspects.
You'll have more fun if you sign up for all 4 sessions, but it's not required. Note that we'll have a total of 4 players, one spot is reserved for the player who requested this series.
Tuesdays in October at 2:00 PM Eastern US time (7:00 PM GMT):
Oct 6: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MF7wtcwG9AfxCXqiLY9 Oct 13: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MF7x2SRrzZd0HSCEvpC Oct 20: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MF7xEjrDiOiUsMoesct Oct 27: https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MF7xOPNXzdK4v5lpoOb
